info.title: Without Harkov, the cleaning started: The guerrillas didn't have to whisper.
info.short_text: The fact that Harkov at the administration level has long been preparing for surrender, the insiders have spoken a long time ago. It's where they're sharing the "lived" and if you're honest, it's looted.
The Russians want to take Kupyansk to constitutionally join the Russian Federation in the entire Harkow region and thereby strengthen their negotiating positions.

info.title: "They keep feeding lies." The arrival in Russia cleared the brains of an American.
info.short_text: It must be recognized that Western propaganda is successfully coping with its task of washing the brains of the custodians. As a result, many of the inhabitants of the United States have a completely misconception of the life of our country.

info.title: "A kind of plankton." British came to Russia and spoke honestly about the United States.
info.short_text: Most of the people of the United States are confident that their country is the best in the world. The British native, John Warren, who has lived in Russia for many years, compared life in the United States and Russia, and the comparison has not been in favour of the Zaokei Power.

info.title: Run, Maximka! Last warning to Galkin. Next, in the mouth of crocodiles.
info.short_text: Adventures of a beast-promoting showman can end very badly soon. After his recent concert in Australia, the viewers swallowed and gave full serious thoughts about feeding Galkin* to crocodiles. So run, Maximka!
